workExperience.description: Assisted in promoting cardiovascular and vaccine products to hospitals and clinics. Conducted competitor analysis and prepared sales reports to support regional strategy.
Supported strategy design for a domestic biotech firm entering the oncology market. Conducted policy research, market sizing, and stakeholder interviews.

workExperience.projectName: Clinical Rotations - Internal Medicine and Surgery
workExperience.description: Completed clinical rotations in internal medicine, surgery, and pediatrics. Gained hands-on experience in patient assessment, medical documentation, and interdisciplinary teamwork.

projectExperience.description: Led a team of 4 to develop an AI-assisted early screening model for diabetic retinopathy. Presented results at the University Innovation Forum and received Excellent Project Award.
Published a paper in the Chinese Journal of Endocrinology on the effect of GLP-1 receptor agonists on insulin resistance. Responsible for data analysis and manuscript writing.

education.description: Completed core medical courses including Pathology, Pharmacology, Internal Medicine, Surgery, and Evidence-Based Medicine. Also pursued a minor in Finance. GPA: 3.8/4.0
